means: 试图，努力( try的过去式和过去分词)

sentence.Network_en: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.
sentence.Network_cn: 努力过，失败过，没关系，屡战屡败，屡败屡战，每一次失败都比上一次更好。

sentence.Network_en: I have tried to pack a good deal into a few words.
I tried to reach the foot brakes but I couldn't.
sentence.Network_cn: 我试图去够脚刹，但是没能踩到。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2009年高考试题——英语(湖北卷)解析版_百度文库 ... in turn.on purpose 故意地, experienced.tried 尝试, signal.chance" 机会&quot.
i tried to be like grace kelly ., 我试著学摩纳哥王妃.
The teacher tried every means to bang grammar into the heads of his students ., 老师想尽一切办法要把语法硬塞进学生的脑子里去.
well i tried to call you , baby ., 我试过打电话给你.

list.abs: triroll gauge 三滚柱式螺纹量规tris isocyanurate 三异氰尿酸酯tris-nonyl phenyl phosphite 亚磷酸三壬基苯醌.
特殊用法试图但未成功 (Conative)：「想要」(wanted to)、「试图」(tried to)、「几乎」(could almost)太3:14「约翰想要拦住祂（受洗）。」
he tried to come between the quarrelling men ., 他设法干预吵架人之间的争端.
The first recipe I tried a fruit sorbet ., 我尝试的第一个食谱是水果冰糕.

jx.jx_en_mean: something that has proved effective or reliable before
jx.jx_cn_mean: 被证明有效（或可靠）的东西

lj.lj_ly: supermarkets generally stick to the tried and true.
lj.lj_ls: 超市一般坚持采用经证实切实可行的方法。

entry.tran: 经过试用的;经过考验的;证明了的
entry.def: Tried is used in the expressions tried and tested ,tried and trusted, and tried and true, which describe a product or method that has already been used and has been found to be successful.

example.ex: Follow the tried and trusted methods that have stood the test of time.
example.tran: 遵照这种经过时间考验已被证实可信的方法。

means.word_mean: 1. tested and proved useful or correct;
2. tested and proved to be reliable

auth_sentence.content: I was terrified, I tried to kill myself.
auth_sentence.res_content: I was terrified, I tried to kill myself.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was terrified, I tried to kill myself.

auth_sentence.content: It also tried to improve the lot of minorities.
auth_sentence.res_content: It also tried to improve the lot of minorities.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It also tried to improve the lot of minorities.

auth_sentence.content: So many have tried, so many have failed.
auth_sentence.res_content: So many have tried, so many have failed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So many have tried, so many have failed.

Sentence.sentence: She suggests that humans have always tried to strengthen the pair-bond to maximise (使最大化) reproductive success.
She tried several jobs, but they seemed very boring to her.
You would not be surprised if a stranger tried to shake hands when you were introduced, but you might be a little startled if they bowed, started to stroke you or kissed you on both cheeks
I tried to call you all night yesterday.
As anyone who has tried to lose weight knows, realistic goal-setting generally produces the best results
Congress has tried to help students with college costs through Pell Grants and other forms of tuition support.

means.word_mean: 考验过的,试验过的,可靠的
经过考验的；可靠的；可信赖的

sentences.en: We’ll be using a tried and tested technique to solve the problem.
sentences.cn: 我们将使用可靠的技术来解决这个问题。
